definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: SARS struck both China and some other counties in 2003 .
sentences.chinese: 2003年非典型肺炎袭击了中国和其他几个国家。

sentences.english: It is said that Doctor Li has been sent to Guangdong to fight against SARS.
sentences.chinese: 听说李医生已被派往广东去抗非典了。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse imaging features of atypical meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析非典型脑膜瘤的影像学表现。

sentences.english: China a spared more than two billion yuan for the fight against SARA.
sentences.chinese: 为抗非典，中国拨出了二十多亿人民币。

sentences.english: I've noticed the government and the people have worked extremely well together in the fight against SARS.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到在抗非典斗争中，政府和人民合作得非常好。

sentences.english: Some thyroid atypical proliferation showed weak positive staining.
sentences.chinese: 非典型增生部分呈弱阳性表达。

sentences.english: Vajpayee also expressed appreciation at Chinese efforts to keep SARS under control.
sentences.chinese: 瓦杰帕伊对中国经过努力控制住非典型肺炎表示赞赏。

sentences.english: The exclamatory markers are especially important for the recognition of the non-typical exclamatory intonation.
sentences.chinese: 感叹标记对于非典型感叹语调的判别有重要作用。

sentences.english: Scientists hope to break through soon in their fight against SARS.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们在与非典的斗争中希望不久有重大成果。

sentences.english: Chinese authorities countered that their experience of the Sars outbreak had taught them to be cautious.
sentences.chinese: 而中国则反驳说非典爆发的经验教会他们一定要谨慎。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into a rational therapy countermeasure of non-type galactophore cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨非典型乳腺癌的合理治疗对策。

sentences.english: Although the SARS war is over temporary, but it has left much thought.
sentences.chinese: 非典遭遇战虽然暂告结束，但却留下许多思考。

sentences.english: In has experienced after in particular the non- standard.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在经历了非典以后。

sentences.english: A new fashion trend, surgical masks worn in public, the SARS spreads to the US.
sentences.chinese: 非典来袭，戴口罩成为新时尚。

sentences.english: Everyone turns pale at the mention of SARS.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都对非典谈而色变。

sentences.english: The Chinese sing high praise for the doctors and nurses fighting against SARS.
sentences.chinese: 中国人高度赞扬抗击非典的医生和护士。

definition: type A influenza/abbr. for 甲型H1N1流感/refers to H1N1 influenza of 2009
